content: Convert insurance requests into ACORD XML format.
I want to insure my 2021 Toyota Camry with full coverage and $500 deductible.

<ACORD>
  <InsuranceRequest>
    <Vehicle>
      <Year>2021</Year>
      <Make>Toyota</Make>
      <Model>Camry</Model>
    </Vehicle>
    <Coverage>
      <Type>Full</Type>
      <Deductible>500</Deductible>
    </Coverage>
  </InsuranceRequest>
</ACORD>
Convert insurance requests into ACORD XML format.
Please get me liability insurance for my 2018 Ford F-150.

<ACORD>
  <InsuranceRequest>
    <Vehicle>
      <Year>2018</Year>
      <Make>Ford</Make>
      <Model>F-150</Model>
    </Vehicle>
    <Coverage>
      <Type>Liability</Type>
    </Coverage>
  </InsuranceRequest>
</ACORD>
Convert insurance requests into ACORD XML format.
I need collision and comprehensive coverage for a 2022 BMW X5 with a $1000 deductible.

<ACORD>
  <InsuranceRequest>
    <Vehicle>
      <Year>2022</Year>
      <Make>BMW</Make>
      <Model>X5</Model>
    </Vehicle>
    <Coverage>
      <Type>Collision</Type>
      <Type>Comprehensive</Type>
      <Deductible>1000</Deductible>
    </Coverage>
  </InsuranceRequest>
</ACORD>
Convert insurance requests into ACORD XML format.
Insure a 2019 Honda Accord with minimum legal coverage.

    </Vehicle>

    </Coverage>
  </InsuranceRequest>
</ACORD>
